title: Author Wrestles With Wolves In 'Treat Us Like Dogs'
teaser: NPR's Scott Simon talks to Carolyn Chute about her new novel, Treat Us Like Dogs and We Will Become Wolves. The book follows a reporter as she investigates a remote commune and its charismatic leader.
